name: Aloft San Francisco Airport

reviews.text: As an SPG Gold and some years Platinum member, I'm pleased to see a new offering near SFO. The Westin is overpriced and the Sheraton Four Points is dated and I don't care for the location.
reviews.title: A new Aloft -- clean and fresh, still working out the kinks

reviews.text: I recommend that folks research what Aloft has to offer before booking because it's not for everyone (see other review from Alecia). Aloft is a budget hotel, not a full service hotel. Like Marriott offers full service hotels and Courtyards and Fairfield Inns -- Starwood offers St Regis, Westins, Sheratons and at the low end...Aloft. Now, as far as budget hotels go, I like what it has to offer. Clean rooms, a comfortable bed, nice big flatscreen, free wifi, really nice gym and a hip, fun bar. I know they don't have a full service restaurant and don't expect room service. I don't stay at an Aloft to be pampered, I stay there typically to be close to an airport, at a price that is reasonable and for that purpose, it fits the bill and is a better choice for me than a Courtyard, Fairfield Inn or other budget hotel offerings (other than Hampton Inns, which I also like).
reviews.title: We went first & 4th night open on our trip. Better by the day.

reviews.text: This new SFO Aloft is bigger than most, but other than that seemed the same to me. Positives: - Location! Super close to the airport...literally the fence to the airport property is just across the parking lot. HOWEVER, I would not stay here as a base for a pleasure vacation to explore San Francisco...as the city is a sold 25-30 min away, with little traffic. For me, this is a place to stay because I have an early a.m. flight or am arriving late in the evening.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel, Poor Service, No Ammenities
New hotel. Nice but still growing up
reviews.text: - Eager to please and friendly staff -- especially bartender (Jason, I think) .
- Quiet - I was nervous because my room was close to the freeway and i'm a super light sleeper, but they have sound-proofed this building well! Very quiet.
reviews.title: Another good Starwood option at SFO

description: Located only a half-mile from the airport, the Aloft San Francisco Airport hotel offers guests bright modern rooms with all the amenities including complimentary wireless internet access. Overnight parking is $20.00 per night
